title: PLZ FOR THE LOVE OF GOD STOP GOING TEEMO JUNGLE!!!!!
body:
This is a shit pick. Teemo JG adds nothing to the team. Please, unless you're like a Challenger 1 trick that specializes in this DONT FUCKIN DO IT IN RANKED. 

Who started this bullshit anyway ?

replies.body: It works sometimes. Only if you don't have AP on your team.
Etremely difficult but very satisfying invades.

To be fair, Teemo is a champion who offers absolutely nothing to a team besides a good early game. Teemo isn't so much designed to be effective more than he is to prevent other people from being effective. Teemo top is literally designed to shut down almost every meta top laner in the game and he still does very easily. It's a 4v4 at that point.

> [{quoted}](name=Scareon41,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=sgF1hgsf,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-05T01:48:15.258+0000)
>
> To be fair, Teemo is a champion who offers absolutely nothing to a team besides a good early game. Teemo isn't so much designed to be effective more than he is to prevent other people from being effective. Teemo top is literally designed to shut down almost every meta top laner in the game and he still does very easily. It's a 4v4 at that point.

Yea, I have no qualms with him Top or Mid. But Jungle ? Eh....just no. Teemo is DPS champ. If you want DPS, it's better to go with Kindred. The problem with this shit pick is that it's redundant. You already have an ADC that provides DPS and most likely a mage mid or top to provide magic damage. We don't need another magic damage DPS champ, we need some kind of CC, hard engage, peel.....something useful. You know how fuckin hard it is to go against a team that picks Sejuani or Amumu for their jungler and you have a Teemo. He just provides more damage, which most likely he nor any of the other carries on your team could apply because your team lacks peel or hard engage. We don't need 3 carries. We need champs to help the carries do their job and deal damage. Even assassins like Rengar and Khazix are far more useful in that they can eliminate the enemy carries. Teemo is just fuckin useless as a jungler. He brings nothing that your typical team comp wouldn't have in the lanes. Nothing at all.
Bloodrazor is awesome on him. I've seem some diamond players actually take smite with him on top just for it. And he's actually a good pick into Kindred, though Kindred has better matchups than him.

Teemo used to be decent in the jg with his shroom providing map control and strong 1v1 against aa based champion. back at the days of sated devourer Teemo was actually a decent pick into xinzhao master yi etc.

Well, damn whoever made the stupid oracle that can sweep through an entire jungle, that rotoer is probably bronze and gets rekt by Teemo, why is why he made this broken ass trinket.
it doesnt work sometime, i played with a silver 3 who went ad teemo jungle and it worked well, when he ganked bot the adc couldnt do shit since teemo blinded him
i have no clue who started this master stroke of an idea but it is so much more fun when i have people like you in my game cuz i love a good laugh
